title: this game doesn't want me to play bard
body:
When I play ranked, I usually win or lose in a normal game, occasionally  I might have raging teammate who ints but that happens from time to time. But for some reason, if I ever want to play my favourite champion, bard in a ranked game, everything falls to pieces. Is it because im a bad bard player? In my more recent bard games, I have vsed a challenger jungle smurf in my gold game so we obviously got stomped. Then in a game our mid laner dced, I had to keep telling the team not to give up because I thought he might come back. I was playing well winning fights with my ults and stuns. Then our mid laner reconnected.

Thats when I proceeded to have long lag spikes (15 seconds) (usually during teamfights) of about 1800ms throughout the rest of the game.
When can I play my favourite chimey boy without lag or challenger smurfs?
